alert.note: Alert for Coastal St. Johns; Eastern Clay; Inland St. Johns (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 08 at 8:39PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central St. Johns and east central Clay Counties through 915 PM EDT... At 839 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a landspout over Picolata, or 9 miles southeast of Green Cove Springs, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts and wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... World Golf Village, Picolata, Elkton and Bakersville. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Coastal St. Johns; Eastern Clay; Inland St. Johns
